mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MAX(idx.rows) FROM SYSINDEXES as idx INNER JOIN SYSOBJECTS AS obj ON (idx.id = obj.id) WHERE (obj.type = 'U') AND (obj.name = 'tb_document')

SELECT maintb.doc_num /* 문서번호 */ , maintb.company_cd /* 업체코드 */ , maintb.confirm_dt /* 확정일 */ , maintb.place_key /* 납품처키 */ , maintb.publish_dt /* 발행일 */ , maintb.company_nm /* 업체명 */ , maintb.place_nm /* 납품처 */ , maintb.supply_qty /* 수량 */ , maintb.file_name /* 파일명 */ , maintb.file_path /* 파일경로 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(19), maintb.modify_dt, 20) as modify_dt /* 최종수정일 */ FROM tb_document maintb WHERE maintb.doc_num = #{doc_num}

SELECT doc_num /* 문서번호 */ , company_cd /* 업체코드 */ , confirm_dt /* 확정일 */ , place_key /* 납품처키 */ , publish_dt /* 발행일 */ , company_nm /* 업체명 */ , place_nm /* 납품처 */ , supply_qty /* 수량 */ , file_name /* 파일명 */ , file_path /* 파일경로 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(19), modify_dt, 20) as modify_dt /* 최종수정일 */ FROM tb_document
and company_cd = #{company_cd} and confirm_dt = #{confirm_dt} and place_key = #{place_key}
mapper.insert:
SELECT case when keyid is null then concat(SUBSTRING(#{company_cd},2,4),'_',replace(#{confirm_dt},'.',''), '_' , right(concat('0000', '1'),3)) else concat(SUBSTRING(#{company_cd},2,4),'_',replace(#{confirm_dt},'.',''), '_' , right(concat('0000', convert(nvarchar,keyid + 1)),3)) end new_cd FROM ( SELECT max(right(doc_num,3)) as keyid FROM tb_document WHERE company_cd = #{company_cd} and confirm_dt = #{confirm_dt} ) NEWKEY
insert into tb_document ( doc_num, company_cd, confirm_dt, place_key, publish_dt, company_nm, place_nm, supply_qty, modify_dt ) values ( #{new_cd}, #{company_cd}, #{confirm_dt}, #{place_key}, #{confirm_dt}, #{company_nm}, #{place_nm}, #{supply_qty}, getdate() )
